description: This course provides advanced language work and on-the-spot investigation of French culture, past and present, including theater, film, visual arts, the French court, the medieval cathedral, etc., through background readings and visits to important monuments. Students read, discuss, see and critique plays ranging from the classical to the contemporary. Prerequisite: One French 250-level course.
name: ID French St--Paris
title: Interdisciplinary French Studies in Paris
